meanings.definition: A device for viewing moving pictures.
meanings.sent1: The kinetoscope displayed a short film of a dancing cat.
meanings.sent2: I watched a classic movie on the kinetoscope at the museum.
meanings.sent3: The kinetoscope seemed to wink at me as I peered inside.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes followed the kinetoscope's images with fascination.
meanings.sent5: The kinetoscope brought the old film to life before my eyes.

meanings.definition: To view moving pictures using a kinetoscope.
meanings.sent1: We decided to kinetoscope the latest film release together.
meanings.sent2: He loves to kinetoscope old movies in his free time.
meanings.sent3: I kinetoscoped the movie so many times, I memorized every scene.
meanings.sent4: She kinetoscoped the action-packed scenes with excitement.
meanings.sent5: Kinetoscoping the documentary made the history lesson more engaging.
